html:div.html:h4: Frequently Ask Question On New Power Supply

Panel.headerText: Can Tata Power give power supply in Mumbai? And in which areas?

html:div.html:h5: Yes, in license area of Tata Power, which extends from Colaba to Vasai Creek and up to Kanjur Mankhurd.

Panel.headerText: Does Tata Power give power supply to individual residences or only to entire society?

html:div.html:h5: Yes, Tata Power can give power to individual consumers as well as to entire societies in its license area.

Panel.headerText: How do I intimate Tata Power of my new project where I need power supply?

html:div.html:h5: Intimation can be given to Tata Power Call Centre (1800 209 5161) or Distribution Customer Acquisition Department ( 091-22-6668 8357 / 67173111 ) against which Request Registration number is issued.

Panel.headerText: Within how many days will the Tata Power Representative contact after request is registered?

html:div.html:h5: Site visit is conducted by Tata Power representative within 7 days after the request is registered and the complete procedure is then explained.

Panel.headerText: Where does customer apply for connection to new project?

html:div.html:h5: Groundfloor,Technopolis Knowledge Park, MahakaliCaves Road, Andheri(E), Mumbai-400093 Tel No: 091-22-6668 8357

Panel.headerText: What is the time frame required to get connection?

html:div.html:h5: As per Standard of Performance framed by MERC,The time period for provision of supply from date of receipt to date of completed application (including submission of substation space agreement if applicable) & payment of charges are given below :

html:li.html:h5: In case connection is to be from existing network - One (1) Month.
Where extension/augmentation of distributing main is required - Three (3) Months.
Where commission of substation is required - One (1) year.

Panel.headerText: Who can apply for New Power Supply? What are the documents to be submitted?

html:div.html:h5: Builders / Developers / Owners of new projects can apply for new power supply. Applicant needs to submit Power Supply Request From (PSRF) along with the following documents.

html:li.html:h5: Proof of Ownership OR Occupation of premises (copy of any one of the following)
Purchase/Sale Agreement with Builder / Previous Occupant
7/12 Extract or property card issued by competent authority in the name of applicant.
Leave & License / Leasing Agreement with property owner
Proof of identity (Copy of any one of the following documents)
Photo Pass (Recognised Organisation Photo Identity Card).
Voter's identification Card / PAN Card / Driving License.
Passport.
Location Map of site
Plan / Layout
Detailed Power Requirement Load Break for the project (As Per Tata Power Format).
No Objection Certificate from MCGM / Directorate of Industries for Industrial Load, if available otherwise to be compulsorily submitted before energisation.
No Objection Certificate (as per approved Tata Power Format) from owner of the premises in case applicant is not the owner.
Proof of Public Utility, if applicable.

Panel.headerText: Who is going to fill up the Load details, since customer does not have electrical knowledge?

html:div.html:h5: A licensed Electrical Contractor / Tata Power representative will help in case of difficulty in mentioning connected load / sanctioned load details.

Panel.headerText: What is the procedure to change from R-Infra to Tata Power?

html:div.html:h5: Submit the Power Supply Application Form along with the following:

html:li.html:h5: Recent R-Infra paid bill copyRecent R-Infra paid bill copy
Photo identity proof.
Ownership proof.
Security deposit and registration fee by cash/ cheque in favor of The Tata Power Company Ltd.

Panel.headerText: What is the procedure to change from R-Infra to Tata Power for the entire society?

html:div.html:h5: To initiate this process, every individual society member to submit the Power Supply Application Form along with the following:

html:li.html:h5: Recent R-Infra paid bill copy
Photo identity proof
Ownership proof.
Security deposit and registration fee by cash/ cheque in favor of The Tata Power Company Ltd.

html:div.html:h5: For society meters, registration certificate needs to be provided additionally.

Panel.headerText: When will I get Tata power Supply?

html:div.html:h5: After submission of completed application form along with necessary documents and payments, power supply changeover will be effected within 30 days.

Panel.headerText: Who will look after the complaints after changeover to Tata Power?

html:div.html:h5: Tata Power will be the single point contact for all complaints, queries and requests. Tata Power shall co-ordinate with R-infra for resolution of technical complaints

Panel.headerText: Why are changeover customers charged Wheeling Charges and Wheeling Loss?

html:div.html:h5: These charges are paid to RInfra-D as per the MERC order, towards usage of their infrastructure for wheeling the power.

Panel.headerText: Will the meter be changed or do we have the option to use the existing meter?

html:div.html:h5: A changeover customer has three options:- (1) Retain the R-infra-D meter (2) Install Tata Power meter (3) Purchase own new meter.
